
## Deployment

## Manual Installation

1. **Clone the Repository**  
   ```bash
   git clone https://github.com/IamDvis/DV-AI-CHATBOT.git
   cd DV-AI-CHATBOT
   ```

2. **Install Dependencies**  
   ```bash
   pip install -r requirements.txt
   ```

3. **Run the Bot**  
   ```bash
   python3 DURGESH
   ```
